channel.title: Changeing MY STATS?
channel.description: how do you change the stats when sum1 first logs in like there beginning stats. and how do i change wut the max lvl for each stat is?

item.title: Changeing MY STATS?
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“gign919191, post:7, topic:160397”]thats easy dude, just open client.java and search for:

return 99

Change the 99 with the max lvl you want, for example:

return 200

This means your max stats for each skill is 200.

Hope That helps ;)[/quote]thanks for teh help rep++ you

item.title: Changeing MY STATS?
item.dc:creator: @code_god_of_rs code god of rs
item.description:
@code_god_of_rs wrote:

rofl dude this is the easiest thing to do in the game!
heres how to do it:

open up the Characters
open your Characters name
go down to the part where it says [SKILLS]
and change it like i have it below

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 99 14000000
character-skill = 1 99 14000000
character-skill = 2 99 14000000
character-skill = 3 99 14000000
character-skill = 4 99 14000000
character-skill = 5 99 14000000
character-skill = 6 99 14000594
character-skill = 7 99 14000000
character-skill = 8 99 14000000
character-skill = 9 99 14000000
character-skill = 10 99 14000000
character-skill = 11 99 14000000
character-skill = 12 99 14000000
character-skill = 13 99 14000000
character-skill = 14 99 14000000
character-skill = 15 99 14000000
character-skill = 16 99 14000000
character-skill = 17 99 14079200
character-skill = 18 99 14000000
character-skill = 19 99 14000000
character-skill = 20 99 14000000
character-skill = 21 99 14000000
character-skill = 22 99 14000000
character-skill = 23 99 14000000
character-skill = 24 99 14000000

now your Character is level 99 in all stats!

hope this helps!

Read full topic
